pages.disclaimers: MansionResort - Disclaimers and Legal Information MansionResort HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Disclaimers By accessing or using the MansionResort website, you agree to the following disclaimers: Rules and Conditions Before participating in games at our casino, please familiarize yourself with the rules and conditions that govern your participation. These rules are provided for your safety and enjoyment. Responsible Gaming Enjoy gaming responsibly. Participation in gambling should be entertaining, not problematic. If you feel that your gaming activity is beginning to have a negative impact on your life, seek help. We promote responsible gaming and provide tools for self-restriction. Security We make every effort to ensure the safety of our visitors. Our premises are equipped with surveillance and security systems for your comfort and protection. 1. Accuracy of Information We strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information on our website. However, we do not guarantee the completeness, accuracy, reliability, or suitability of the information, products, and services offered. 2. Availability of Services Availability of rooms, amenities, and services at MansionResort may vary and is subject to change without notice. We do not guarantee continuous, uninterrupted, or secure access to our website or services. 3. Limitation of Liability MansionResort and its affiliates shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of your access to or use of our website, services, or any content provided. 4. External Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites or resources. These links are provided for your convenience only. MansionResort does not endorse, control, or guarantee the accuracy, relevance, or reliability of these external sites. pages.privacy-policy: MansionResort - Privacy Policy and Data Protection MansionResort HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Your Privacy Matters MansionResort prioritizes safeguarding your personal information. This policy clarifies how we gather, utilize, share, and secure your data when you interact with our website. Data We Gather We might collect details that identify you, like your name, contact methods, and payment information when you book a stay or utilize our offerings. How We Utilize Your Data We leverage your information to process reservations, enhance our services, keep you informed, and personalize your MansionResort experience. Sharing Your Data We hold your personal information in strict confidence and won't sell, trade, or otherwise disclose it to external parties unless legally required or to deliver the services you requested. Security of Your Data We have security measures in place to shield your personal information. However, it's important to remember that perfect security doesn't exist online or in electronic storage. Updates to this Policy We may occasionally update this Privacy Policy. We'll keep you informed by posting the revised policy on this page. The MansionResort website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline MansionResort DISCLAIMERS PRIVACY & POLICY TERMS & CONDITIONS

pages.terms-conditions: MansionResort - Terms and Conditions of Use MansionResort HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Welcome to MansionResort! Excited to have you here! By using our website, you agree to these terms that outline your stay with us. Booking & Reservations To secure your stay, all bookings require confirmation and availability checks. We reserve the right to adjust or cancel reservations if needed. Payment Options Unless otherwise stated, full payment is required at booking. Additional charges may apply for specific services or amenities. Cancellations & Refunds Cancellation policies vary depending on your reservation type. Details on fees and refunds can be found in your booking confirmation. Guest Conduct We value a respectful environment for everyone. Guests are responsible for their actions during their stay. Any property damage or rule violations may result in additional fees or termination of your stay. Your Privacy Matters We take your privacy seriously. To understand how we collect, use, and protect your information, please review our Privacy Policy. Changes to Terms We may update these terms occasionally.
